channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced 2019-04-08 Deprecated ratios from StatsData. Reason: Sustituted by hits. Finally removed on 2019-07-08 . 2019-04-03 Deprecated cache from OperationDetailed. Reason: Sustituted by trafficType. Finally removed on 2019-07-03 .

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Stats-X 2019-04-30 Added new required input field retrieveAssets to indicate if assets are needed. Assets returned limited to 100 to avoid too big responses. This limitation makes sense since the main objective is not to access to all the asset nodes. 2019-04-23 Fix an error building internal queries when Quote/Booking and Other are requested. 2019-04-11 Added new input field owner to allow filter by organization.
